website_summaries.verdict: Great price for a TV with HD capabilities. Includes desirable Roku smart TV functionality.
pros: At 32 inches, this model makes a good second TV for the bedroom
Nice to find Roku smart TV features in a budget-priced model, as you'll have plenty of apps in an easy-to-use interface
Offers a wide viewing angle, which works well for seeing the screen from a side view
Three HDMI ports is a good find in a small-screen TV

customer_reviews.title: No picture after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This tv has stopped working about 2 weeks in. It has no picture and we have tried all troubleshooting. We will have to return it, which is a total pain as we recycled the box.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks !
customer_reviews.text: This is what happens to it i bought In April and this happened today
customer_reviews.author: Bestamazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already acting up not even a week in. 2 months later lines across screen
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for 6 days, and now every few minutes I get kicked out of Netflix and put back onto the main tv screen. It's very annoying.... UPDATE... 2 months in, and I turn It On to find lines across the screen Updated again, saw that it is a year later, and I havent heard from support about a replacement or any sort of help. I regret spending 299 on this TV, especially seeing as its 219 now
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Got this to use Netflix.. Netflix crashes repeatedly.
customer_reviews.text: I'm incredibly frustrated with this product. I don't have cable so I got this to use streaming channels like Netflix, but the Netflix app on the Roku is so ridiculously glitchy it's not even worth having the TV anymore. Every 5-10 minutes, the app crashes and reverts to the home screen. It is not a problem with Netflix as it's working fine on my phone and laptop. I did some research and found that many other people have been having the exact same issue. I never leave negative reviews but this is egregious. Fix your system with an update that addresses this problem and I will update my rating accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Wall mountable TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought at a good price during amazon prime only sale earlier in the year. Quick easy set up with wall mount bought on amazon as well. Quick Easy wireless setup with access to applications such as Netflix, YouTube, HBO. Use on the wall for a room that’s 8 by 10 feet
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ABC

customer_reviews.title: Thet're junk, no customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tv of this kind that I have received, because I had to return the first one, I could not get it to work, no customer service, they do not respond to calls or respond to emails even though they day they will, I will send this one back as soon as I get out of the the hospital & am able to purchase a new tv locally.........their service is terrible and the set up & "ease" of operation of the tv is not there...........really, I have 2 other smart tv's & no problems...............NO ROKU for me and I would never recommend one...........what a waste of time & $$
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed In Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: so disappointed wifi didnt work on the tv out of the box. all my other wifi enabled devices are connecting everytime. I tried hours of troubleshooting which ended up being a complete waste of my time. I can't rate anything but the experience and quality control needs to make sure TCL is shipping working products. To add insult to injury it doesn't seem there is an Ethernet connection so you must have wifi. Common errors include not strong enough wifi though my tv is literally next to my router. Won't gamble with TCL again.
customer_reviews.author: weso

customer_reviews.title: One Large Problem - otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a problem. The roku function is poor with Netflix. When streaming netflix it freezes and reboots about every 20 minutes. This is an unacceptable problem. Otherwise TV has a good picture, good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lenkey

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointed - Misled by reviews
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m VERY, VERY disappointed. The picture is only fair; it breaks up, isn’t always clear and is poor when there’s fast motion on The screen. The audio is AWFUL and I have to turn the volume up almost to the max in order to hear it well. I’m very surprised the ratings on this were so high and it was because of those ratings, that I purchased this TV. I should have spent more to get a better TV because this one is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Speicher

customer_reviews.title: Great TV/picture for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far we are super happy with this TV... especially for the price. Although, we have Roku plug-ins on all our other TV's, this is our first official Smart TV and we have found it very easy to set up and navigate. The remote is small and easy to use (similar to other Roku remotes) .. only wish we could swap out the CBSnews and Sling quick buttons for Hulu and Google... otherwise happy with the remote. Do to several other reviewer's posted issues with TLC's pixel flaws, we will definitely be keeping an eye out for that... .and will update review if we face any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two months and it is toast. Not able to detect Wifi
customer_reviews.author: Chester Allen

customer_reviews.title: one complaint
customer_reviews.text: There is one complaint I have with this tv. When you power it off a bright white light comes on at the bottom of the tv. Why on earth would they design a tv that has a light that is contantly lit when powered off and goes off when powered up? Therefore it is always drawing some power. What a waste of electricity and lights up my bedroom so much I have a hard time falling asleep to this very bright white light.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: great connectivity, image quality
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you know what you are buying this TV for. If streaming is your thing, look no further. This set is relatively basic but everything is there: great connectivity, image quality, decent sound, comfortable controls, lightweight. My only regrets? I should have spent a bit more to get 4k instead of 1080P and maybe bigger size. It is surprisingly lightweight, modern looking and relatively slim. I would have gone with more sophisticated (and expensive) Samsung for things like live TV and gaming but this one is king for your streaming needs.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the ....
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture. Sound isn't great, but it's a TV not a stereo. Defect? Does not automatically connect to my WiFi when TV is turned on. I have manually check the connection. EVERY TIME I TURN IT ON. EVERY. SINGLE. TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Butch F.

customer_reviews.title: seems good at first /:
customer_reviews.text: it's suuuuper easy to use very nice interface you can purchase themes that are pretty cool and customized the remote is super simple very easy to use has a nwtflix button right on it super convenient being able to have all my consoles hooked up and ready at the same time and it's overall super simple and a great purchase very well worth the money edit: after 6 months it’s super laggy buttons don’t do anything until a long while after you push them it stops my applications and glitches out frequently and netflix stops working way too much i’ve had to factory reset it multiple times i’m sending it back
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It's alright for the price I guess, but get something better if you can afford it. Remote it comes with barely works. I think about half my button presses get registered. Also was randomly changing input sources when. I was trying to sign into netflix, what's up with that? Also there's no buttons on the TV itself so if you lose the remote you're sol. EDIT: Removing another star because now Netflix doesn't even work on this thing. Randomly kicking me to the home screen about 5 seconds after starting anything
customer_reviews.author: Nick Qualkenbush

customer_reviews.title: I feel as though I should be credited for the 20 plus dollars I had to pay to ship back a second faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. The first one was sent without a remote or a cable so I was without a television for over a week because UPS claim to deliver it three times and there is no way they even knocked on the door because I was home along with two other people at every second of the day. My replacement television when I did finally get it it lasted a few days between the screen just went blank and because it took a few days to die I had to go out of pocket to buy a huge box to put it in to return it which put me out another $28
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Paris

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set-up, easy access to netflix and sling from your remote control. 40 inch is a 40 inch screen indeed (don't know why another review complained about it). Loving it so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably price with Netflix issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 TCL TV's already, and I like them overall. If you watch Netflix alot, you can forget about this TV and the Roku integration. In both TV's, Netflix always kicks you out and then when you uninstall the app to re-install, it doesn't install. Some other apps also don't work at times. I was going to get a third TCL TV, but after these issues, I've reconsidered. For the price, its reasonable, but with the very faulty Netflix app, consider another TV.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: TCL common sense remote.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 28" (smart) TV for use in kitchen as OTA TV only without internet or any other connections. This is our third TCL TV and another outstanding value with easy setup and use. Finally someone with common sense designed a remote control without the never used/needed numeric key pad. This remote is as simple to use to select channels as it was before the age of digital electronic. The second thing we noticed is the sound quality of the speakers. I'm sorry I can't comment on the "smart/Roku" functions but I'm sure TCL got those right too.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: TV will stop connecting to internet for hours
customer_reviews.text: At least once a week this TV will fail to connect to my wireless router for hour-long periods. It's incredibly frustrating because no amount of restarting will fix this issue, just time. None of my other devices have trouble connecting to my internet. Even when the TV is connected, some channels just don't load sometimes. Specifically Netflix, HBO, and Al Jazeera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my
customer_reviews.text: After using this tv for about 2 months i started to notice some dead pixels...I didn't mind at first but then it gradually started speading across the top part of the screen...now there's this insane colored glitch on the top which ruins everything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio chip can't handle external source.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv because it happened to be the cheapest one on Amazon at the time, but I soon found out why. The problem with this tv is an under powered audio chip with insufficient memory. Anytime you change input sources, such as switching from hdmi1 to hdmi2, the audio crackles in and out and the only way to temporarily stop it is to turn the TV off and back on again. This is a common problem with this unit attributed to insufficient audio memory, just Google it. I'm am incredibly disappointed with this television and I'll avoid all Roku and tcl products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Cream Genes

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with performance of TCL
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the money. Set up was easy and quick, I'm excited to use Roku on a regular basis. Picture quality is better than expected. I have 5 HD TV's at home, all recent models and the new TCL performs better than all of the major brand TV's I currently have. I mounted in a corner space to the wall and was able to do on my own as the weight of the TV is minimal. The remote control is small and makes options easy to navigate. I highly recommend this product and all TCL TV's if they perform the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bargain!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this TV because it is amazingly inexpensive for a bedroom TV. I didn't have very high expectations but I am very pleased with the value I received in this purchase. Picture is decent with vibrant colors. Setup was much easier than my much more expensive TV. The remote is very basic but much to my surprise this is actually a good feature. The operation is very intuitive and smartly designed. If you want to set up a high end home theater, spend more money. But if you want a TV to watch at a bargain basement price I would highly recommend considering this model.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: TV cannot last a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple of these tv's. They work great for about a year, then always have issues. The main issue is the wireless connection. It will work for hours, then suddenly no network connectivity. Rebooting the tv fixes it, but can be annoying when you have to reset 4 times in 2 hours. I have had this happen on 3 of the TV's. Finally started replacing them with other better brands.
customer_reviews.author: Troy E.

customer_reviews.title: Cincerned about it long term
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's not terrible. It's the perfect size in my opinion for a child's room. I love the Smart features and the price point. I don't love that we've owned the tv less than a week and it's already frozen twice. I have serious concerns about longevity. Also the picture is not great, again what I would expect at the price point though so no serious complaints about that
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Iacoboni

customer_reviews.title: Unable to secure the stand.. twice
customer_reviews.text: Received this TV and was unable to secure the stand to the base of the TV. I ordered a replacement and I had the same issue. I will not order one of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Oliva

customer_reviews.title: This TV is not so " Smart."
customer_reviews.text: DON' T BUY THIS TV!!!! Persistent software glitch makes downloading ON DEMAND content really S-L-O-W or video & sound are out of sync. So if you have SLING . FX Now, ESPN on demand...etc, and want to watch back episodes--- forget about it! Hope you enjoy watching the download lcon spin round and round. I'm STILL waiting ( despite a warranty) for customer service to get back to me re: shipping the TV back. I would have been better off buying a decent Samsung TV and buying a cheap Roku stick. I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2200 sq ft home, with 3 google routers and fiber optic internet. We bought this TV as a bargain on Amazon prime day. We hooked it up, started streaming...and then had the tv lag about every 2 minutes while attempting to stream shows. Customer service was horrible trying to fix it. Blamed our internet. I explained i just tested it through google and we had 250mbps of download speed. They had no other suggestions and said I’d need to contact amazon for a return. DO NOT BUT FROM THEM
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dodds

customer_reviews.title: It's a good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third TCL/Roku flat screen. I have the 49" and two 43" units, well, my mom has one of the 43" screens. The first two have been running just fine for almost two years. Simple interface is easy for my mom to use but has all the knobs if you go looking. Lots of added channels. The RF deck seems better than the Visio that it replace, I'm seeing more channels with less drop-out (I live in a fringe area.) If for some reason I would need another TV, it will be a TCL. The TV's pair well with the Edifier bookshelf speakers (  ) since, like all flat screens the sound is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: nethead

customer_reviews.title: 2nd TV I've bought in this model, won't connect to wifi
customer_reviews.text: I have owned previous models of the TCL Roku TV, which all worked great. However this particular model (2nd one I've purchased through Amazon) is absolutely horrible, it will NOT connect to my home wifi, no matter what I try! Something has changed between the 2017 model and the 2016 (which connects just fine as do all of my other smart tvs) and I'll be starting my return for this one today.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value tv
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value TV. Picture and audio exceed my expectations for a sub 300 tv. We bought this during a lightening deal and are using in our bedroom. Wifi is plenty strong enough in our house, although router is not that far away (across hall in office). I love having the roku interface, especially since we dont have cable and just use streaming services.
customer_reviews.author: B. Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: It's been a month and it is perfect so far!
customer_reviews.text: They are right-- this home screen and remote are the easiest we have ever had! And the TV picture and quality are great-- especially for this price. I held my breath worried about some of the poorer reviews, but everything has been perfect here so far. Setting it up was easy-- it practically did it itself with wifi, antenna, devices, Netflix, and Hulu, and even hooked into Alexa without an issue. Now we are happily watching a glorious picture with all the fixings. (If you don't see an update added in later, then it means everything is still perfect!)
customer_reviews.author: brian mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a very good TV that's packed with features.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This set was easy to set up and looks and sounds amazing, especially for the price. I set up a Roku account and quickly linked my Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, Vudu, and Pandora accounts, all with my smartphone. I recommend setting the sound to "theater" mode and picture to "Vivid", but that's just my personal preference. The bottom line is this television is paired with features and extremely easy to use, all at a price that can't be beat. My parents have had one for a few years, and have had zero problems with it. I'll update if anything goes wrong with either one.
customer_reviews.author: CapnCaveman

customer_reviews.title: Don't but this TV....Remote Breaks and There are no buttons on the actual device that powers on the TV
customer_reviews.text: Update,After having this T.V. for about a month the remote died on me. I replaced the batteries but the remote was dead. After trying everything nothing worked. I checked the negative reviews and searched google and apparently there is a problem with the remote. The video fixes on youtube were of no help as the TCL remote seems to not have the required button to reconnect the tv. What a disaster. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: John Marino

customer_reviews.title: Great T.V..!!!! Cheaper than Dept.. stores. Well worth the wait.!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new T.V. Super easy set-up. Easy remote. Easy interface. Cheaper than same T.V. at Department stores. It's super lite. I have it on a 360° wall mount. It's awesome couldn't be happeir.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Comer

customer_reviews.title: That's less than 9 months old and it's useless. Others have had similar issues while others have ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the TV on August 30th and it died on May 2nd, I took it off the wall to paint and when I turned it back on, the whole middle of the screen was black lines. It wasn't dropped or twisted or damaged while removing it. That's less than 9 months old and it's useless. Others have had similar issues while others have no trouble so II guess it's buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Forest

customer_reviews.title: Smart, Excellent and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this TV so much. I was so impressed I bought one more for the Master bedroom. I was worried that a thin TV would affect the sound (I had bought a 25 inch a few years back and the sound was horrible) The TCL has excellent sound, clarity of the picture and options. I'm so impressed with the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, great price and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: my first tv was damaged in delivery and I thought twice about having it replaced.... but the seller paid for return shipping and the new one arrived in 2 days. the picture and sound are great It is lightweight - unpacked, moved and hung it myself the remote rocks - one click for on, one click for the application put in the network and password once and it connects automatically every time you turn it on. not like my samsung which makes me connect and reconnect and is slower than ....... better than any TV I've ever owned I didn't get paid for this review and I don't work for this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problems here
customer_reviews.text: I had this tv for a few months now and I had no problems with it. Its easy to connect my gaming system and switch back to the regular home screen. This tv is easy to get around with the apps. Netflix youtube amazon prime hulu and much more can be downloaded on the tv, you wont even need cable. Roku has its own channel so you can watch many things on there. The tv generally has a lot to offer, I would recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkpeaches12

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: i had the 2015 version which is crisp and sharp, that is why i m getting this one, but this one really disappointing me. only movie mode is acceptable but too warm, other modes will lose picture color and quality (unwatchable). color mode only warn is working, cool and normal will expose picture causing white dots. do not get this one, go for the 2015 version if tcl is still keeping up with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: After one month, this tv is not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv on Amazon Prime Day. I was so excited to get such a good deal with Roku built in. But, the TV has been very disappointing. It rarely connects to Hulu or Netflix; I typically get some kind of error message or blank screen. It also frequently plays audio but shows only a black screen. Do not spend your money on this. I am very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap trash is still trash.
customer_reviews.text: Major POS...defaults to WiFi and will not let you open SETTINGS to change input to OTA if it cannot find strong signal. Then, it just stops working. We've used this POS maybe 6 times, as it was a poolside TV and had been in indoor storage all winter...so the warranty had run out when it just FAILED completely. I know it is a real bargain price, but JUST DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS YOU LIKE THROWING YOUR MONEY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: cazhfilmer

customer_reviews.title: This TV is junk.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even last 2 weeks. I turned it on and the screen went black. I called Amazon Tech Support and was told it was fried. I later found out the brand is poor quality. I had to package it and return it to Amazon. It was not easy. I am a handicapped senior. It left me with a bad feeling about Amazon, because some of the Customer Service Reps I spoke with were not surprised by what happened.. When a product is that poor of quality advise customers or stop selling the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: There is NO other TV on the market that's this cheap, yet has great quality. TCL is the best.
customer_reviews.text: The TV's operating software is Roku, meaning you don't have to purchase it separately. There are no fees with Roku, except for channels which you buy extra, like Netflix or Sling TV. The Roku channel comes with it and you can watch many shows and movies on it. The only problem with the TV is that it's pretty quiet, but the quality of the sound being produced is pretty good. There is no other TV on the market that's so cheap, but has great quality. And the fact that it's a Smart TV makes it even more worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the smart part of this TV
customer_reviews.text: This television will not unlock until you go online and set up a Roku account so you better have WiFi. They ask for personal info and credit card info. After you submit online it sends a signal to the TV to unlock. It bought it to watch satellite and this TV puts up messages over the top of my satellite programming wanting me to buy upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: jason meyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget TV but make sure to allow time for set up
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and nice that it is a smart tv since we don't have cable. We like to watch tv and movies using the netflix, hulu, and hbo apps. The TV took some time to set up. It couldn't connect to the wifi because it wasn't updated. We couldn't update it because it wasn't connected to the wifi. We had to download the update to a flash drive and connect that to the TV to update it to finally connect to the wifi and set up. The set up was the only hassle. Now that the TV is all set up, it is great to watch everything easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast thought-to-watch time, responsive remote
customer_reviews.text: My biggest frustration with smart viewing devices like sticks or TiVos is how long it takes to go from "I want to watch something on Netflix/Hulu/etc" to actually watching it. My TiVos can take MINUTES and sometimes I think "nah, screw it" bc of the trouble and the remote input lag. This TV is effing amazing. It takes about 10 seconds to get back to watching what you were watching. The interface is responsive and the color and sound are great. I've rarely been this happy with an electronics purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst smart tv I have. I like to try different products out, I have 3 different smart tvs. My friends enjoy the Roku stick so I thought I would give this Tv a try. I deeply regret it. It is slow and it is not an easy to use Tv.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny E.

customer_reviews.title: Roku tv
customer_reviews.text: The TV itself is good for the price point. The picture is ok. My main issues are with the remote. I wish they'd make a regular remote. They've wasted space on the remote with dedicated buttons for Netflix, sling,Hulu and Starz. They need to get rid of those and add numbers. The remote is very annoying to use. The buttons are so loud when you press them. It's hard to channel surf regular TV. There's no button to go back to previous channel and there are no numbers like on a regular remote. Sometimes buttons don't respond and sometimes they skip ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Kwame

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this tv
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv 5 months ago. It was great until a few weeks ago. When attempting to turn the tv on, the power light starts flashing, and then I reach the tcl roku tv screen. The tv then turns off, and it continues to cycle off and on, never reaching the home screen. It is very upsetting after just purchasing this. I did search and there's several forums with people that encountered the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good Roku box with a tuner.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy a TV from mail order always get a warrantee. My mother could lift this TV with one hand so I'm sure overworked mail men may toss it around. If it breaks Amazon has always been nice about returns and repairs. Just know its cool, fun and cheap, but won't be in the family for generations. Unfortunately, my Apple TV passed on and it cost the same without a screen. The way tech works if it lasts a couple of years I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: "You buy cheap, you buy twice"
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer sent a defective product that had outdated software and therefore was not able to connect to the internet and be set up. The manufacturer refused to take ownership or even offer any discount for the inconvenience. Huge lack of support by TCL. The MAC address was 00:00:00:00:00:00 The Software version was: version 7.2.5 - build 6316-08 Also, the guys troubleshooting process was literally: 1. Turn Off/Turn On 2. Reset Terrible experience. I requested a full refund from Amazon and will never buy TCL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Vizio!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids room. We are a roku family. I was shocked to see the picture was better than my Vizio. Last night my vizio went out again. So I bought this to replace it. I'm sure I'll be way more happier. Since this vizio went out twice in two years. I've only owned it for 4.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moise

customer_reviews.title: It is indeed great quality 1080p
customer_reviews.text: Splendid value for money. The contrast and saturation is not up to the mark but this costs only 200 bucks so it delivers very well for that price tag. It is indeed great quality 1080p. Does not have a browser so that's a downside. But you can cast from laptop and mobile and go about your business on both the devices so no problem at all. Roku channels are rubbish but you have every other streaming option available so no worries there either
customer_reviews.author: Preetham Niranjan

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a noticeable improvement over the TV it is replacing (2012 model). Good picture and good sound. I usually go between antenna TV (cord cutter) and the internet through a HDMI cable and both of those are one button push away. At first I thought the remote control was a joke. Very simple. After using it for an hour or so I have grown to like it. Easy navigation with a very basic remote. So far I am very happy with this new TV. Can not speak for longevity, but we will see. Also it is very light.
customer_reviews.author: DSL

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV! The roku features makes it really easy to use and a great tv if you don't have a cable subscription and want to watch shows from apps like I do. It was also really easy to hook up to other components like a chromecast (for 1 or 2 apps that don't appear in the roku channels) and a blue ray.
customer_reviews.author: Cautious Buyer

customer_reviews.title: When Customer Service is in Pakistan, buy somethinfg else!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in late November 2017. When I received this to be used as a computer monitor, all was well. After 3 and a half months, it quit. Trying to work with the Support at TCL is a joke. They requested that I email a video of the problem, along with a photo ofg the serial number (which is in mico text on the back ot the tv), a copy of the invoice or other; all for a $150.00 TV. Time involved to correct ??? Life is to short. I'm goinf to Sam's Club and buy a better TV at the same or lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard E. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this thing, I was afraid that wasn't going to be "smart" enough and was going to be slow.... I tell you., have a Samsung same size in another room and compared to this one Samsung is garbage... I love Samsung brand., my phone, all my appliances, my biggest TV on the house, everything is Samsung and I'm happy with everything except the small TV, small TV is the slowest thing ever, if like me, you need a small TV for your room or whatever, this TCL is your best bet believe me ...streaming is fast enough not to irritate you image is clear with good colors and unlike other brands is ready to Roku.... :)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service from TCL
customer_reviews.text: The customer service for this product was horrible. The TV's feet were broken and I provided TCL with photos and a request for new feet. They never responded. Finally Amazon agreed to send a new TV and I appreciate their customer service. The TV itself is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Wilden

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Upated: Lines appeared on tv right after manufacturers warranty was up, they did nothing. Tv also started having connection issues. Don’t Waste your money!!!!! This TV is amazing, it is super functional and user friendly ( my 4 year old started using it and watching his shows as soon as it was out of the box. Also the ROKU remote app for your phone makes it so I don't have to worry about the remote getting lost, which with kids happens a lot. For the price and quality of TV you get I would recommend this to anyone looking for a smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jadie

customer_reviews.title: TV IS FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: TV is terrible! After a week the apps will all crash and the Roku is basically unusable. I've emailed Roku so many times and they still have no solution to this. This TV is fraud, if you don't believe me then google "Roku TV crash" and so many reviews for years past will come up and Roku still has no solution. It's almost impossible to contact Roku for help also because they don't have any customer service
customer_reviews.author: Jehzeel Sabillon

customer_reviews.title: Not functioning properly
customer_reviews.text: Extremely unhappy. When going to Netflix the tv returns to the home screen, about 4 times a day. This does not happen on our other tv. Also the tv locks up say when loading a show and then hitting volume, only a few times though. The picture is often pixelated and weird looking, and once again not happening on our other tv. Same router. Going to try warranty but not expecting much.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday, set up was simple and I'm not mechanically or electronic savvy. If I can do it anybody can. Great picture and great streaming. My son bought 1 of these 2 years ago and recommended it. I can see why. Will update my review after more use.

customer_reviews.title: I hate to complain but the first TV I received was ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate to complain but the first TV I received was horrible. Not ten minutes after I had it opened and turned on it started pixelating. It would sometimes turn off and then not turn back on. The TCL support was helpful and I was able to get a new TV. It took me forever to get it though. It took me like a month and a half to get this problem fixed. Let's hope this one works a little better. I'll let you guys know! The new TV has a great screen though and I love Roku's set up. It really user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Post

customer_reviews.title: Conking out after less than a year - beware!
customer_reviews.text: First thing is that the receiver signal in front of the TV is very large and has a bright light at night. If lights keep you awake, then find another TV with a smaller, dimmer light. Second, we've had the TV less than a year, and it is already going bad. Cable guy told us that the ports were ''dying'' and we'd need another TV shotly. Audio is not in sync with the voices on TV; TV pauses and goes black then pops back on whenever it feels like it. Now when we change channels, there is a long pause between channels and a loud ''beep-click'' every single time the channel is changed. Would not recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: arte

customer_reviews.title: Great value! - updated review (2)
customer_reviews.text: (Updated review) This TV is very nice! Its a good size for the dresser in the bedroom. I purchased it in the spring of 2017 for my vacation rental home and have had no customer complaints! Customers signed up for a roku account and got right onto their netflix accounts. I just purchased a second 32 inch TV for my home to replace an older outdated tube tv. Looking forward to getting it.... update! Just got my second tv set up and enjoying my shows! Great picture too.
customer_reviews.author: Annette D.

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are VERY techy & have tons of time & patience don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: So far i am totally frustrated and disappointed with this TV. It seems to be fine for prerecorded programs but not for current TV, i.e., CBS Evening News (only archived not current), ESPN has volleyball (yuck), etc. It seems that the shows i watch require more programs or software. TCL has been somewhat helpful but unable to fix - now referring me to Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice TV- good picture- great deal
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a "smart" tv with Roku. It's a nice TV- good picture- great deal, but the ROKU service/or the TVs ability to maintain a signal is a little sketchy. For example, some days I'll be watching Netflix and I'll get bumped out the the TV's main homescreen every 20-30 minutes. I've verified my internet connection is fine so I don't know exactly what the problem is. Also, I had purchased a Bigger TCL TV for the living room- and it does the same thing. I will probably not buy another TCL with ROKU.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV. Love the apps, love that you can customize what apps you want on, love the sound quality as it’s pretty loud just at volume 30 and goes up to 60 plus I think, love that you can use your iPhone as a remote control, love that it easily attached to the wall mount, overall great tv so far at a great price. I bought the 43 inch for $225 I think. Pretty good price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product worked exceptionally well for the first few months then it started to have problems. Though the picture is excellent the tv tends to either disconnect from a perfectly running internet network or freeze to the point you have to unplug it to get it to work again. The remote only seems to work if you’re less than five feet away from the tv and the batteries run out very fast. All in all I would not suggest to buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV
customer_reviews.text: Love these TCL TV’s. They have a great picture and are easy to set up and use. I have 2 more rooms to go and my entire home will be TCL. For parents, it is also easy to turn off your kids bedroom TV’s using the APP from your phone. :)
customer_reviews.author: Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: The TV was easy to set up and produces a great picture. The only adjustment I made to the picture was to increase the sharpening a bit. The Roku aspect of it works wonderfully and we are streaming a number of sources (DirectTVNow, Netflix, Prime, CBS All Access, HBO, Showtime, etc.) through it. Before the purchase I read where a few people had problems but so far (it's been about a month), all is great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. DeVange

customer_reviews.title: Wow, hard to imagine Amazon would sell such a poor TV.
customer_reviews.text: This was my only choice in a smart TV for a small space. Trying not to buy a new entertainment center for a larger TV, I went with this TV. It was set up and turned on and worked fine. However, the picture is simply awful. Multiple attempts at adjusting the so-called (because it seemed like they didn't work) picture controls did not get rid of the slightly out of focus picture, the unnatural skin tones and the screen burn-in from scene to scene. I didn't expect a high quality TV, but this is so far below middle of the road it is shocking to me. DO NOT BUY THIS TV.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Wing

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I don't think you can beat this TV. We were reducing our cable bill by getting rid of cable boxes, and DVRs. This worked great. We just added the Spectrum app, and it works. My mom still has all her favorite cable channels in her bedroom, without having to have a cable box in there that we have to pay rent on. The picture quality is excellent (for a 720p TV). The price is so low, it'll have paid for itself in a little over a year. Add in all the free extra streaming services available, and it's a real bargain. Now to save up for a 50" one for my bedroom...
customer_reviews.author: Roamin' Roman

customer_reviews.title: You cannot beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV. Very easy to use Roku system. Cons are that it takes a while to start up, the remote is very small, and the stand is sort of flimsy. However, the price point was almost half that of better known Korean and Japanese models and it definitely does the job. I can't justify paying more when technology is changing so rapidly. If your ego is built on having a top line TV for your superbowl party this may not be the unit for you, but for anyone else would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Great budget TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value TV. The Roku interface is pretty fast and it integrated really nicely with our TV antenna and attached game system. Changing inputs and/or apps is as simple as pressing the home button and choosing the appropriate item from the home screen. Streaming video apps work great with no signs of playback issues. It really is a wonderful TV. This being a budget TV, the trade-offs include a lower 720p resolution and the contrast of the picture drops sharply at harsh viewing angles. These drawbacks are totally acceptable at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to start off and say I love this TV it is very nice everything built-in works ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to start off and say I love this TV it is very nice everything built-in works perfectly one big flaw do not use in your bedroom there is a light at the bottom of the TV that is so bright it is horrible when trying to sleep good for the living room not for the bedroom. I have attempted to cover up this light using duct tape it has deemed it a lot you can still see light but it's nowhere near as bad but the TV is very difficult to turn on and off now due to the duct tape beware
customer_reviews.author: Xeorty

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a piece of crap. It works fine at first then just simply stops working. First it doesn’t turn on at all. So I went to the TCL help site which says to unplug it and replug it. That works except I have to do that now every time. Then the TV takes longer and longer to load the smart content until it only loads partially and I’m listening to a show on Netflix with only partial sound. The TV is only 18 months old. Spend you money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Huszar

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality for an SDR at 720P is great, great sound quality and the clicking sound alot ...
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using this TV outside the US somewhere in Africa (With a Step down Transformer and Dual Voltage UPS) . The picture quality for an SDR at 720P is great, great sound quality and the clicking sound alot of people complian about is one of the things I love about the TV. Overall am happy with the purchase. It serves as my PC monitor, i watch YouTube Video and Netflix Movies directly on it using WiFi. It's interesting to note I like the games that can be downloaded and played on the TV using WiFi too. I notice it doesnt connect on HotSpot from a Mobile device though not sure why but it's not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ebipabo Fred

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect choice for second TV or TV for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect choice for second TV or TV for bedroom. I do like a lot customization for video and audio settings in setup menu. As any flat screen TV the sound quality is not good but by setting to "Theater" gives me acceptable for bedroom quality. Manufacture even put unique option allow you shut down annoying power light when TV in stay by mode.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale and was excited to get a smart TV for so cheap. I learned quickly the picture quality is subpar, one of the legs was broken when it arrived but I let it go and figured it might get better or easier to deal with. Now it freezes every time I try to watch anything. I've done all the troubleshooting. It does the same thing. I thought I was getting a deal but I spent money on problems instead. UPDATE: after a couple of months with this product I've had no one reach out to me to help. Awful product. Still regret buying.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.G

customer_reviews.title: I bought this tv a little over a month ago ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv a little over a month ago and it's already messing up, every time I go to an app to watch something (Hulu, Netflix, HBOGO etc) it will immediately exited out of the app and back to the homepage, making it impossible to watch anything!
customer_reviews.author: Taylour

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV if you have "cut the cord"
customer_reviews.text: If you no longer want to pay for cable or sat - this is a great TV. The built in WIFI means you just have to plug it in - no other cables. The built-in ROKU player works wonderfully - same look and feel (remote as well) as stand-alone ROKU players, so there's no confusion if you're a "roku only house". Would have been nice if the remote were bluetooth instead of IR, but that's a small price to pay for having everything in one nice box.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan A. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first TV we bought and we wanted a smart TV. The past reviews of TCL were way too good. Hence, we went with the latest 2017 version. The delivery was quick and the TV is very light. Good resolution and top of that its Roku compatible. That means you dont have to buy Roku dongle. In a gist, it's value for money. Must buy if you are looking for a cheap Smart TV with a brand name involved.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not a Dark Age TV
customer_reviews.text: 1. I cannot find any way to manually delete channels when hooking up an antenna. You're stuck with what's scanned. 2. Wouldn't connect to wireless at initial setup, then mysteriously did connect. And I just disconnected my previous TV that had a roku stick that connected easily and worked fine for years. 3. Poor/No instructions, status light brightly lights up room when sleeping. Have to go online to troubleshoot. UPDATE: This TV took awhile to figure out, and I now would get it again. This is just a strange TV, I'm waiting for other issues to appear. The inability to to delete antenna channels is sad for supposedly cutting edge technology. Roku TV is not cutting edge.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV
customer_reviews.text: This tv is for a spare bedroom that only gets used a few times a year so I did not want to put much money into the tv and there was also a size restriction to fit into the cabinet opening. This tv worked out the best for what is needed. I have never bought a TCL TV before but I was greatly impressed with the features, the easiness to set up and picture quality. My last three big screen smart tv's have been Samsung and all three have had multiple problems from the start. When it is time to replace them, it will not be with Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: jdaysy

customer_reviews.title: Great sensible sized TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent little TV for the price. I used it to mount something unobtrusive in a living room. It's small enough to not have a big presence in the room, but big enough to be better than watching on an laptop. Having Roku interface built in is a huge plus. Roku is way better than most "smart tv'' layouts and it comes with everything you need to start streaming easily. Pros: Great price Sensible size for certain rooms Built in Roku Cons: Good video quality at best Mediocre audio Loading up apps on Roku can be slow
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Television for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this television no expecting much for $169 but was pleasantly surprised. It was easy to set up and worked well right out of the box. Reviews said that other more expensive televisions had a clearer screen, but this screen is exceptionally clear. It also has wireless internet which can make connection easy. I don't have an antenna so that feature has not been tried yet. But, overall, it is a great television for the price! Review submitted by Michael H. Keehn
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Keehn

customer_reviews.title: Cord-cutting heaven!
customer_reviews.text: First impression: It's the cord-cutting solution I've been dreaming of! Netflix was down when I set it up so that was a momentary scare, but it came back up soon. The interface is fantastic and being able to ditch a remote is always nice. (Whoever's been complaining about the included remote, btw, you must be missing something; it does everything it needs to.) I'm concerned about the comments others have made about durability but only time will tell. One complaint: the included stand is wobbly so I'll have to put a shim under one leg.
customer_reviews.author: Faking Faker

customer_reviews.title: Dead display, returning ASAP and will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dead display, no visible signs of damage to the box or TV itself. Called TCL and tried to trouble shoot by pressing the reset button for 15 seconds, unplugging for 15 seconds, etc., etc., etc., with no success. Told to return to Amazon. Agree with posts expressing concern about lack of quality control. Have decided to buy from a higher quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: This a nice Smart TV that has all the necessary apps and output for the regular person, it worked great since startup and was very user friendly to configure, the size of the TV seemed like it was specially taylored to what I needed talking about space to put it in, it does have some not so good qaulities but for the money paid and for the use I will put it by is ok, the screen "glass" reflects any light that it catches and the sound is not so great, but those two things can be avoided with, not turning on the ligth and using a sound bar, overall I thing is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great tv purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this TV! Since the price is pretty affordable, I was concerned what I’d be getting. But the size is great and isn’t too heavy or bulky. The one complaint is the volume seems to have to be pretty far up for good volume/clarity. But that is minor to me. I also enjoy that it comes with roku and I was able to download all the other apps we use. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Toton

customer_reviews.title: Needs better keyboard support, otherwise awsome.
customer_reviews.text: A solid product for the money. I have had it over six months now. Works great. Did blue screen and freeze a couple times, but booted back up fine at restart. The power button is under the TCL light at the front if you can't find it. It is the worst spot ever for control buttons. Works with most Roku remote phone apps, except for the keyboards, which seem to be only partially supported. Could have been made away better just with a keyboard remote instead of the standard Roku remote. There is a lot of log in and search input that has to be done and it is a pain on a directional pad.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Austin

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity Issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough one, at first we couldn't be happier, overall price and quality WAS great. We've only had the T.V. about 10 months and now all the sudden we'll be watching something and it just drops the internet connection. I'm 100% sure it's a T.V. issue because ALL other devices in our home are connected to internet showing all bars. It's especially frustrating because when this happens we'll have to manually enter all of our wifi credentials and that doesn't even always work. There're times (LAST NIGHT) where I just give up and turn off the T.V. because I can't get it to connect to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has worked awesome for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a monitor and TV... I work from home and wanted a TV in my office to stream DTVNOW but when the day spun up about 10am wanted to use it as a monitor.. This has worked awesome for my needs.. With dealing with spreadsheets this was great and even sharing my screen on conference calls looks great. I have also found moving it around is very easy.. It is extremely light weight and I love how easy I can move it from room to room as needed.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaChick

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this TV for a little over a month now and have only one small complaint. When I received the TV, there was one pixel that was dead, but it didn't bother me enough to deal with the hassle of returning the TV. I really like the interface, it is very user friendly and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: 1 was so good we bought 2 :)
customer_reviews.text: We liked this so much we bought another one :)
customer_reviews.author: DothanSAHM

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is really slow. When you select Netflix it takes about 5 min just to load. Scrolling through videos is almost impossible. Randomly keeps restarting. Gets disconnected from wifi very often. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish
